DOC.brief_summary: Dynamic prospective cohort Spanish university graduate . The main objective evaluate association nutrition lifestyle chronic disease .
DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Mediterranean Prospective Cohort : SUN Project
DOC.detailed_description: The SUN Project ( University Navarra Follow-Up Study ) begin 1999 , currently 20,500 people participate . The Project permanently open new volunteer , around 2,000 new participant invite year . A new questionnaire send participant every two year . The questionnaire name letter `` Q , '' follow number year pass since participant first volunteer . The first questionnaire title `` Q0 '' follow `` Q2 '' , '' Q4 '' , etc . The cohort `` dynamic '' thanks fact permanently open new volunteer . Although Project create Department Preventive Medicine Public Health University Navarra , count invaluable collaboration Spanish university center . Thanks invaluable collaboration participant , investigator able research cardiovascular disease , depression , fertility , arterial hypertension , car accident injury , among area .
DOC.criteria: Spanish university graduate Spanish university graduate
